short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to rotate the orientation of the screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to use your laptop while lying down in awkward positions? 

Enter Screen rotator, the perfect solution to align your chrome tab to the tilt of your head to reduce strain while browsing.
